response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we believe it's worth more than what it costs us. However, I understand that value perception varies from person to person. Considering the value this product holds for you, I propose a fair deal of $9,500 for it. This price not only reflects its worth but also allows us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. I hope you find this proposal appealing and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 9500}
